name: FNF But Decent (Extra Folder + Custom Dialogue)
name_original: FNF But Decent (Extra Folder + Custom Dialogue)
description:
Have you ever thought "sure fnf but bad is good but its just too bad for me." If so, how do you think in lowercase? Also, this is the mod for you! With improved graphics from the mod you love! CLF approved, at least I think. Satan is scared and so are we. Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo2qzhDrPhR06G0ejkI9h9g
Adding vocal covers when the mod is done
No kade engine
